title.native: 異世界居酒屋～古都アイテーリアの居酒屋のぶ～
title.romaji: Isekai Izakaya: Koto Aitheria no Izakaya Nobu.
title.english: Isekai Izakaya: Japanese Food From Another World

description:
Izakaya “Nobu” is a modest establishment, staffed by only two people: master, Nobuyuki Yazawa, and server, Shinobu Senke.

Despite its humble appearance, its entrance is mysteriously connected to an ancient city from another world: “Aitheria.” Nobu’s patrons consist of lazy palace guards, incognito clergymen, and the Waterworks Guildmaster – certainly not your average clientele!

But once they enter Nobu’s doors, they are greeted with the finest alcohol they’ve ever tasted and dishes the likes of which they’ve never seen. With the food plentiful and the drinks flowing, the patrons leave their troubles at the door as they call, “Give me a cold ale, master!”

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

node.description:
**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mariko_itoh222) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/okome2014/)

In 2008, she married fellow animator [Tatsufumi Tamakawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109607/Tatsufumi-Itou), who changed his name to Tatsufumi Itou after marrying her. 

Her husband passed away from a brain hemorrhage on May 23, 2020.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

After joining [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise) and serving as a production assistant, he made his debut as a director in the 10th episode of [Aoki Ryuusei SPT Layzner](https://anilist.co/anime/3079/Aoki-Ryuusei-SPT-Layzner/).

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

After joining [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise) and serving as a production assistant, he made his debut as a director in the 10th episode of [Aoki Ryuusei SPT Layzner](https://anilist.co/anime/3079/Aoki-Ryuusei-SPT-Layzner/).
Originating from [Nomad](https://anilist.co/studio/70/), where she initially worked as a production assistant.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/koshiaki09)

Formerly affiliated with [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/), currently affiliated with [Studio Kafka](https://anilist.co/studio/6754/Studio-Kafka).
Mainly a producer, but occasionally directs.
